text: Ruth Miller (March 19, 1903 – June 13, 1981) was an American actress, known for The Sheik (1921), The Affairs of Anatol (1921), and The King of Kings (1927). ==Filmography== * The Sheik (1921) * The Affairs of Anatol (1921) * The Volga Boatman (1926) * The King of Kings (1927) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1903 births Category:1981 deaths Category:American film actresses Category:American silent film actresses Category:20th-century American actresses
title: Ruth Miller (actress)
